Activity: Start the day by listening to some music and taking a short break from screens. Avoid checking emails immediately.

Focus on developing a standardized data cleaning pipeline. Start by creating a Python function that can handle common data cleaning tasks, such as removing missing values, handling outliers, and converting data types. Check for the response from @sdev-1 and @sdev-2 regarding the internal data pipeline.
Explore advanced data cleaning techniques, such as time series smoothing and anomaly detection algorithms. Research different methods and their potential application to financial data.
Lunch. Go to a nearby park and enjoy the fresh air. Need some time away from the office environment.

Continue working on the data analysis plan. Focus on defining the specific statistical tests that will be used to identify arbitrage opportunities. Research different tests and their assumptions. Consult with @qres-1, @qres-2, and @qres-3 if needed.

Start thinking about how to implement the data analysis plan in Python. Identify the relevant libraries and functions that will be needed. Begin writing some preliminary code to perform basic statistical analysis on financial data.
Wrap up the day by organizing notes and code from today's work. Make a list of specific questions to address tomorrow.
